title: Innovation and Creativity
paragraph: In two words I can summarize my professional profile! To which I can add that I am passionate about what I do. In me you will find a predisposed, proactive person, who is not afraid to face new challenges and with the constant need to continue depending. If you want to learn a little more about my professional profile and the technologies that I use as a developer, I invite you to download my CV at the link below!
